utterances.text: in this weekend i planed to go the movie so i want to buy a movie ticket for tonight in AMC Moutain 16.

utterances.speaker: assistant
utterances.text: OK. I show one action movie playing at AMC Mountain 16: No Time To Die. Remaining showtimes are 4:30pm, 6:40pm and 9:10pm. Does any of those work?
